summary: A prompt AI website where users can interact with an AI through prompts.
imageRequirements:
## Required Images
- Abstract warm dark editorial background with soft moody gradients in charcoal, warm beige, and blush rose tones, subtle light bokeh, cinematic atmosphere (hero-bg.dim_1440x900.png)
- Minimalist AI brain/spark logo mark in rose-gold on dark charcoal background (logo-icon.dim_128x128.png)

existing_features.title: Build a prompt input interface where the user can type a message into a text area and submit it via a button or Enter key. The input should be cleared after submission and show a loading state while awaiting the backend response.

Build a conversation display area that renders the full prompt/response history as a chat-style thread. User prompts appear on the right side; AI responses appear on the left side. New messages scroll into view automatically.
Add a 'Clear Conversation' button that calls clearHistory() on the backend and resets the displayed conversation thread to empty.

Apply a sleek dark-mode editorial visual theme inspired by the warm monochrome tones, soft gradients, and clean typographic style seen in the uploaded reference images. Use a warm charcoal/dark beige background, off-white text, rose/blush accent colors, and a refined sans-serif typeface. Apply this theme consistently across all UI elements: header, chat bubbles, input area, and buttons.
Render the generated hero background image (hero-bg.dim_1440x900.png) as a static asset in the app header or page background from frontend/public/assets/generated.

new_feature_requests.summary: Prompt input interface for AI interaction

Create a backend actor with the ability to store and retrieve conversation history (prompt + response pairs) per session, including functions: submitPrompt(text: Text) which stores the prompt and returns a simulated AI-style response, getHistory() which returns all prompt/response pairs in order, and clearHistory() to reset the conversation.
